function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of awareness about specific roles and responsibilities","category":"Organizational risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate time management and organization","category":"Organizational risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited knowledge sharing and interaction between colleagues","category":"Organizational risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"In-person gatherings for learning sessions and webinars can increase the risk of contagious disease transmission among employees.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Staff turnover reduction and engagement initiatives may lead to complacency in following health and safety protocols, increasing the risk of contagious disease transmission.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Travel initiatives, such as sending employees back to their own country, may contribute to the spread of contagious diseases if proper health and safety measures are not implemented during travel.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of recognition and appreciation in the workplace may lead to decreased motivation and job satisfaction.","category":"Organizational risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate training and knowledge sharing may lead to a lack of preparedness for handling contagious diseases like covid-19.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective communication and engagement initiatives may lead to emotional repercussions and anxiety among employees.","category":"Organizational risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Restriction of team building and group engagement activities due to social distancing norms","category":"Organizational risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Offsite employees unable to express and share their stories and experiences","category":"Organizational risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited communication from leadership due to remote work","category":"Organizational risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Emotional fragility of team members leading to decreased productivity and performance","category":"Organizational risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential liability for conduct related to discrimination or harassment.","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mental health crisis leading to anxiety, burnout, and other serious conditions among employees","category":"Organizational risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"In-person interactions during interviews and onboarding process","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of screening for vendors and visitors","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of familiarity with company policies and relevant legislation","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of clarity around what constitutes acceptable reasons for absence may lead to employees with contagious diseases coming to work.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of clear guidance on non-essential travel may result in employees traveling to high-risk areas and bringing contagious diseases back to the workplace.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"In-person meetings and training pose a risk of contagious disease transmission due to close contact and shared spaces.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Employee entertainment events with communal sharing of food and social gatherings pose a risk of contagious disease transmission.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of necessary supplies and cleanliness protocols pose a risk of contagious disease transmission and inadequate containment practices.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Employees not complying with social distancing rules","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate remote work setup for employees","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of clear communication and understanding of workplace rules","category":"Organizational risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of clear communication about policies & protocols leading to confusion and non-compliance.","category":"Organizational risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Feelings of loneliness and gratitude among employees affecting mental health and well-being.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of empowerment and support for on-the-ground teams to find solutions for crisis management.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of empathy and understanding from leaders towards employees’ work-life balance concerns","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Mental health challenges due to pandemic-related emotional impact","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate communication and training on safety protocols and new skills for employees returning to work","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Employees concerned about exposure to contagious diseases in the workplace.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic uncertainty affecting employees’ ability to meet basic needs.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of centralized document access and communication may lead to inconsistent understanding of protective measures and infection transmission","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential breach of confidential medical information and biased decision-making based on medical conditions may lead to legal and ethical implications.","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Prioritizing higher-level employee needs without adequately addressing physiological, safety, and social needs may lead to decreased employee well-being and performance.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Employees returning to the workplace without proper training on new work and cleaning procedures.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Working in pairs or groups without proper precautions and prevention measures.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of dedicated resources to manage prevention measures and ensure compliance.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of comprehensive safety and hygiene training for employees","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate social distancing measures and guest contact protocols","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient food safety standards and protocols","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases due to lack of hygiene and cleanliness standards in hotels.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Employees being infected with covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Financial hardship for employees and business partners","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of contagion for frontline covid-19 fighters","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Suspension of resort operations leading to under-occupancy and potential spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Temporary resort closure leading to financial strain on employees and potential economic impact on the local community.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of clear communication and guidance leading to anxiety and stress among employees.","category":"Organizational risks","confidence":"Medium"}]}
